verbose_text: The existing research indicates that the expression of certain GST genes were induced by : cold, heavy metal ions, salt, polyethylene glycol (PEG), H 2 O 2, methylviologen (MV), ABA, salicylic acid (SA), jasmonic acid (JA), 1-naphthylacetic acid (NAA), auxin (IAA), cytokinin (CTK) and herbicides and safeners to respond to abiotic and biotic stresses.
